food ordering app.

UI/UX Design | User Testing.

For the course "Produktutveckling i medieteknik med metoden "Design-Build-Test" I and three other students were tasked with creating a new design for a pre-existing food delivery application.

In order to create a user friendly and fullfilling design we started by doing some preliminary research into user habits and patterns when it came to the usage of other food ordering applications.
